amendment.description: Amendment places a moratorium on a provision of current law that permits State and local governments to purchase goods and services directly from the General Services Administration's Federal supply schedule.
amendment.purpose: An amendment not preprinted in the Congressional Record, to place a one-year moratorium on a provision of current law that permits State and local governments to purchase goods and services directly from the GSA Federal supply schedule.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Zeliff amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
